typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['loan.csv']) ~> source1
source1 derive(each(match(type == 'string'), $$ = toUpper($$))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(, )
